description: This file defines the Response class in the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which represents a JSON-RPC response message handling in a WebSocket context. It includes method declarations for accessing response ID, checking if the response is a result or error, retrieving result/error details, and validating the response.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access response details.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response is a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object if present.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response is an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object if present.
